detail_desc: Two-strand necklace in different designs of metal chain with pendants. Adjustable fastening.
Short-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and rounded hem.
Polo-neck collar in a soft cable knit. Fleece lining.
Top in smocked cotton jersey with elastication over the shoulders and short, elasticated puff sleeves in a broderie anglaise weave.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a round neckline and gathered yoke front and back. Buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a brushed finish. Drawstring hood, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, side pockets with a tab and press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and cuffs with press-studs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.

Shirt in premium cotton with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with a reversible sequin motif on the front.
Bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Slim-fit chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly with a button. Diagonal side pockets, a decorative coin pocket at the front and fake back pocket.
Sleeveless lace top with a round neck, opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and a raw-edge scalloped hem. Partly lined.
Set with a pair of braces and a bow tie. Adjustable, elasticated braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details. Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric with an adjustable fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Cropped top in washed cotton jersey with small sparkly stones on the front. Narrow ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Set with a long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in jersey. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Trousers in superstretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs.
Fine-knit long-sleeved jumper in soft merino wool with saddle shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and a lace trim at the cuffs and hem.

Long dress with a lace bodice and pleated chiffon skirt. Wrapover top that opens with concealed press-studs under the bust for easier nursing access. Cap sleeves with scalloped edges, and a concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining at the top and satin lining at the bottom.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with underwired, padded cups and wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Covered elastication at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Extra firm support.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Seven pairs of studs, one pair of hoops and one pair with a pendant. Size from 0.3 cm to 2.5 cm.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom at the top and earflaps with ties. Fleece lining.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.

Short dress in airy plumeti chiffon with a frill-trimmed V-neck and wrapover top with a concealed press-stud at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Partly lined.

Short dress in a cotton weave with a square neckline. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a rounded hem and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted, knee-length dress in jersey made from a linen and viscose blend with a round neckline and wide shoulder straps.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with lace details, a round neckline and long sleeves.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, short, double-layered flounced sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.

All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. The zip has a chin guard. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of all-in-one suit is organic.
Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back that has a rubber print and ventilating hole pattern.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Reflective details. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Baby Exclusive. Mittens in a soft wool rib knit with a jersey lining. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Scarf in a soft wool weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 32x180 cm.
Sleeveless dress in seersucker made from a cotton blend. Narrow cut at the top with twisted shoulder straps, and a gently rounded hem.
Short skirt in woven fabric with gathers and a ruffle detail at the front and a zip at the back. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides. Size 45x190 cm.
Ankle-length, pattern-weave trousers with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist and decorative buttons at the front. Inset woven section at the crotch and wide ribbing at the hems.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cropped, fitted, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a sheen. Short sleeves and an overlocked edge around the top, sleeves and hem.
Blouse in soft slub cotton jersey with a V-shaped opening at the top, a small, smocked stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.
Calf-length dress in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Top in soft viscose jersey with lace over the shoulders and a rounded hem.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and legs with contrasting colour side stripes and wide cuffed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey. Narrow cut at the top and a turtle neck.

Oversized shirt in washed cotton denim with a pointed collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in washed cotton twill with a high waist and wide, tapered legs with decorative seams at the hems.
Sleeveless, round-necked top in an airy, pattern-weave fabric decorated with plastic sparkly stones front and back. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Playsuit in patterned jersey with a wrapover top and short sleeves. Deep V-neck at the back with ties at the top, a seam at the waist and short, wide legs.

Long dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening with a tie at the back of the neck. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps, jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide hem. No fasteners.
Three-strand necklace in metal chains of various designs, two with a pendant. Adjustable length.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Long-sleeved, fitted body in lace with an opening and button at the back of the neck, a seam at the hips and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey, one with an all-over print.
T-shirts in soft jersey. The cotton content of the T-shirts is organic.
Hi-tops with elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short jumper in a soft rib knit with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Headband knitted in soft cashmere with a wrapover front.
Leggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets. One patterned pair.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed turtle neck, short sleeves with ribbed trims and a ribbed hem.
Sleeveless blouse in a soft viscose weave with a narrow collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Double-layered hat in patterned cotton jersey.
Pleated halterneck dress in a double layer of chiffon in a narrow cut at the top with a tie and a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck and narrow elastication at the back. Lined.

Set with a hat and pair of mittens in soft, thermal fleece. Hat with sewn-on ears at the top and a hook and a loop fastening under the chin. Mittens with elastication at the wrists. Size 2-6M without thumbs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves, decorative metal buttons on the shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in a soft rib knit. V-neck and a sewn-in wrapover at the front with a decorative tab and metal ring at one side.
Fitted T-shirt in airy cotton jersey.
Dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, wrapover top, 3/4-length sleeves and a seam under the bust with a detachable tie belt.
